data.title: REDUCTION FREE NORMALIZATION FOR A PROOF-IRRELEVANT TYPE OF PROPOSITIONS
data.abstract: We show normalization for a type theory with a hierarchy of universes and a proof irrelevant type of propositions, close to the type system used in the proof assistant Lean. The proof uses the technique of Artin glueing between the term model and a suitable preseaf model. This can also be seen as a proof relevant version of Tait’s computability argument.
data.keywords: Dependent Type Theory, Normalization, Presheaf models
